channel.title: CVE Feed for FreshTomato -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FreshTomato -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-28664|2024-08-03T06:03:52.096Z -- freshtomato -- freshtomato
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the httpd unescape functionality of FreshTomato 2022.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.The `freshtomato-mips` has a vulnerable URL-decoding feature that can lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2022-28665|2024-08-03T06:03:52.065Z -- freshtomato -- freshtomato
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the httpd unescape functionality of FreshTomato 2022.1. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.The `freshtomato-arm` has a vulnerable URL-decoding feature that can lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2022-38451|2024-08-03T10:54:03.887Z -- freshtomato -- freshtomato
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd update.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
